When there is no BMS to reply, the inverter repeats the following frames (in hex)
over and over until it errors out. It will continue to send them even when it
displays an error. This is a behavior that's consistent with polling. There's a
slight delay between frames, but I did not measure it.

01030001000295CB
0103003300017405
01030001000295CB
0203003300017436
01030001000295CB
03030033000175E7
01030001000295CB
0403003300017450
01030001000295CB
0503003300017581
01030001000295CB
06030033000175B2
01030001000295CB
0703003300017463
01030001000295CB
080300330001749C
01030001000295CB
090300330001754D
01030001000295CB
0A0300330001757E
01030001000295CB
0B030033000174AF
01030001000295CB
0C03003300017518
01030001000295CB
0D030033000174C9
01030001000295CB
0E030033000174FA
01030001000295CB
0F0300330001752B
01030001000295CB
1003003300017744
01030070000185D1
010300710001D411
0103007200012411
01030073000175D1
01030034000285C5
010300740001C410
